reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Support the Government of Iraq to develop Education Strategy

description.narrative: Against the backdrop of the SDG 4 within the Education 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, the government of the Republic of Iraq aims to reconfirm and renew its commitment to respond to the needs of learners and education staff. To this end, the government of Iraq, supported by key partners will prepare a National Education Strategy 2020 - 2030. The Strategy will allow education stakeholders to build on achievements from the Comprehensive National Strategy for Education and Higher Education 2012-2022, align sector goals to the government's development vision as outlined in its National Development Plan 2018-2022 and respond to the changed context by working collectively towards the common goal of ensuring access to safe and equitable education and improved learning.
